channel.title: English Podcast - Improve your English language skills by listening to conversations about Australian culture
channel.description: World Languages Podcasting provides a podcast series in various languages for the intermediate to advanced language student to help improve language skills and knowledge of Australian culture. Each conversation is complemented with a full transcript and a page of language exercises that may be downloaded from the website www.worldlanguagespodcasting.com.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Conversations in English about Language & Culture in Australia
channel.itunes:author: World Languages Podcasting

item.title: Podcast in English #9 - Australian films (continued)
item.description: Glen and Lynne continue their discussion about the Australian films that are culturally significant to the Australian people.
item.itunes:subtitle: Australian films (continued)

item.title: Podcast in English #8 - Australian films
item.description: Glen and Lynne discuss a selection of Australian films that are generally considered to be culturally significant to the Australian people.
item.itunes:subtitle: Australian films

item.title: Podcast in English #7 - Christmas in Australia
item.description: Lynne and Glen discuss the nature of Christmas in Australia and how it contrasts to the Christmas experienced overseas.
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas in Australia

item.title: Podcast in English #6 - Iconic Australian People
item.description: Nicole Kidman. Steve Irwin. Colleen McCullough. Ned Kelly. Lynne and Glen ponder a number of individuals that could be quite easily categorised as iconic Australian people.
item.itunes:subtitle: Iconic Australian People

item.title: Podcast in English #5 - Australian Cultural Icons
item.description: In this podcast, Glen talks with his friend Lynne about locations that are undoubtedly considered as Australian cultural icons.
item.itunes:subtitle: Australian Cultural Icons

item.title: Podcast in English #4 - The Australian secondary school experience
item.description: Glen speaks to Ben, an Australian secondary student, about his impressions of life at a secondary school in Melbourne. Ben also draws on his experience of his exchange student experience to Germany and his family home stay.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Australian secondary school experience

item.title: Podcast in English #3 - Studying in Australia
item.description: How does Australian society structure its system of education? How expensive is an Australian education? Which avenues of study are open to both international students and Australian citizens?
item.itunes:subtitle: Studying in Australia

item.title: Podcast in English #2 - Australian People
item.description: Who are the Australian people? Rozenn and Glen discuss the multicultural and multifaceted society that is Australia.
item.itunes:subtitle: Australian People

item.title: Podcast in English #1 - Australian Slang
item.description: Rozenn and Glen discuss some of the slang words and expressions that are used in every day language in Australia.
item.itunes:subtitle: Australian Slang
